snippet: Larry Speakes, who spent six years as acting press secretary for President Ronald Reagan, died Friday in his native Mississippi. He was 74....

headline.print_headline: Former Reagan Spokesman Larry Speakes Dies at 74
headline.main: Former Reagan Spokesman Larry Speakes Dies at 74

lead_paragraph: Larry Speakes, who spent six years as acting press secretary for President Ronald Reagan, died Friday in his native Mississippi. He was 74.
